issue.title: [Website] Maintain and use DOAP file, or delete it
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9165](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9165). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-295 added a DOAP file so that Arrow could be listed at https://projects.apache.org/. Unfortunately, the next step of registering it in https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/comdev/projects.apache.org/trunk/data/projects.xml never happened, so we're still not in the list.

Moreover, this file is not maintained, so it still lists the current Arrow version as 0.12.0.
